title: The Orchha palace on a misty morning
caption: The Orchha palace on a misty morning
desc: Sunrise can be quite a pleasant sight on a misty morning at Orchha Palace, Madhya Pradesh. Of course, we advise you to dress warm if you visit in the winter. Most probably, you’d experience below 10-degree temperatures in the morning around this time of the year. Alternatively, you could just sit back and enjoy the view on today’s homepage!
copyright: Orchha Palace on a misty morning at sunrise (© Luigi Vaccarella/Sime/eStock Photo)
